name: entelequia-track
description: A comprehensive delivery tracking system with backend API, internal panel, and courier mobile app

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && rails server" "cd panel && npm run dev" "cd courier-app && npm run web"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd panel && npm install && cd ../courier-app && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd panel && npm run build && cd ../courier-app && npm run build

author: Entelequia Team
